ui.content_require_photo: In iPhone settings, tap on "Travel Manager" and turn on "Photo".
ui.content_require_storage: In app settings, tap on "Travel Manager" and turn on "Files and media".
ui.content_require_camera_android: In app settings, tap on "Travel Manager" and turn on "Camera".
ui.content_require_camera_ios: In iPhone settings, tap on "Travel Manager" and turn on "Camera".
